title: The nefaliem's Trial
description: “Do you have what it takes to be a Knight?”In 2035, Nephelia. A planet housing one of the earliest races—a dragon race. A hybrid of angels and demons. That long ago, were sanctioned to search for the many Codexes of Innocence lost throughout the Galaxy.When Sixteen year old, Kalverya Nindo, undergoes an ancient Trial. A Trial, of Seven Points, to determine her worth and valour in becoming a Silver Knight—an honourable title among the Nephalem. One that the United Planets and Council sorely needs. She endures many situations and learns that sometimes enduring is all you can do.
author: Kia Scarlette
